item.title: Redis
item.description: Getting started Redis is a distributed in-memory data structure store used as cache, database, and message broker. Installation To install redis follow the official instructions Redis server and redis-cli tool will be installed Making sure redis-cli is installed Open up your shell (terminal, console, wsl whatever). Typing in redis-cli --version should show installed version of redis. $ redis-cli --version redis-cli 6.2.6 Connecting to redis instance Specify -h parameter to connect with needed host.
